channel.title: Rs-Reloaded - Eco/PK - 24/7 VPS - Tons of bosses/minigames
channel.description:
[center]
[b]Website[/b] - http://rsreloaded.co.nr [b]Client[/b] - http://uppit.com/901jhgm4h8fx/Rs-Reloaded_Client.zip [b]Client[/b] - http://www.mediafire.com/?b7wl00kcx4g42ol
Runescape Reloaded is an eco based server with many thing's to do working g/e we are still in beta got many thing's to do int he future like add tons of new place's and monster's, We are very friendly we will help you anytime you need ill be add screen shot's soon. The owner is Michael. we currently need staff member's so please don't wait to join we will always welcome new players so bring your friends and you for some good ole fun(: so Enjoy see you on the server here is a download link making website soon so yea!
--Jesse-- [b]____________________________________________________________________________________________________[/b] [b]Developers:[/b] Jesse Michael
[b]Server Features:[/b] -24/7 -VPS Hosted -Staff needed -Dungeoneering Skill -Summoning W/ Specs -Overloads for pking -Working 634 items with bonuses and features -Tons of mini games -Good Economy -Tons of bosses
[b]Mini-games:[/b] -100% Barrows -100% Pest control -100% Fight arena W/ rewards -100% Duel Arena -Troll Mini-game w/ 30 waves -Free for all w/ rewards -Fully working castle wars
[b]Bosses:[/b] -All Godwars -KBD (In wildy) -Dags -Chaos Elemental -Tormented Demons -Corp -Bork -Nomad -Balance elemental -Many more
[b]Pictures:[/b] [IMG]http://i1163.photobucket.com/albums/q541/clearserver/7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1163.photobucket.com/albums/q541/clearserver/6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1163.photobucket.com/albums/q541/clearserver/5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1163.photobucket.com/albums/q541/clearserver/4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1163.photobucket.com/albums/q541/clearserver/3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1163.photobucket.com/albums/q541/clearserver/2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1163.photobucket.com/albums/q541/clearserver/1.png[/img]
See you there![/center]
